verses.verse: And he showed <S%H7200><s%> me Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and Satan <S%H7854><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> at his right hand <S%H3225><s%> to be his adversary <S%H7853><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Satan <S%H7854><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> rebuke <S%H1605><s%> you <S%H7854><s%>, O Satan; Yes <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah that has chosen <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> rebuke <S%H1605><s%> you <S%H181><s%>: is not this a brand plucked <S%H5337><s%> out of the fire <S%H784><s%>?
Now Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was clothed <S%H3847><s%> with filthy <S%H6674><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>, and was standing <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%>.

And he answered <S%H6030><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> unto those that stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, saying, Take the filthy <S%H6674><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> from off <S%H5493><s%> him <S%H559><s%>. And unto him he said, Behold <S%H7200><s%>, I have caused your iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> from you <S%H3847><s%>, and I will clothe you with rich apparel <S%H4254><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%>, Let them set <S%H7760><s%> a clean <S%H2889><s%> turban <S%H6797><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>. So they set <S%H7760><s%> a clean <S%H2889><s%> turban <S%H6797><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>, and clothed <S%H3847><s%> him with garments <S%H899><s%>; and the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was standing by <S%H5975><s%>.
And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> protested <S%H5749><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: If you will walk <S%H3212><s%> in my ways <S%H1870><s%>, and if you will keep <S%H8104><s%> my charge <S%H4931><s%>, then you also shall judge <S%H1777><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%>, and shall also keep <S%H8104><s%> my courts <S%H2691><s%>, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you a place of access <S%H4108><s%> among these that stand by <S%H5975><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> now <S%H3091><s%>, O Joshua the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%>, you and your fellows <S%H7453><s%> that sit <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H582><s%>; for they are men that are a sign <S%H4159><s%>: for <S%H935><s%>, behold, I will bring forth my servant <S%H5650><s%> the Branch <S%H6780><s%>.

For <S%H68><s%>, behold, the stone that I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>; upon one <S%H259><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> are seven <S%H7651><s%> eyes <S%H5869><s%>: behold <S%H6605><s%>, I will engrave the graving <S%H6603><s%> there <S%H5002><s%>, says Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, and I will remove <S%H4185><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of that land <S%H776><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, shall you invite <S%H7121><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> under the vine <S%H1612><s%> and under the fig-tree <S%H8384><s%>.
